description:
As a flipper
  I want to scan multiple marketplaces for items
  So I can find flip opportunities across platforms

steps.name: I am logged in as a free user
the database is seeded with test data
I navigate to the scanner page
I select "eBay" as the marketplace
I select "Electronics" as the category
I set price range to "$50-$500"
I click "Start Scan"
I should see a "Scanning eBay..." progress indicator
within 10 seconds, results should be displayed
each result should show:
results should be sorted by flippability score descending
I am logged in as a free user
the database is seeded with test data
I have an active scan running for "Craigslist"
I have notifications enabled
a new listing appears with flippability score > 80
I should receive a browser notification
the notification should show the item title and score
clicking the notification should navigate to the item detail page

elements.name: Filter scan results by flippability score

steps.name: I am logged in as a free user
the database is seeded with test data
I have scan results displayed
I set the flippability filter to "70+ only"
only items with score >= 70 should be visible
the count badge should update to show filtered count
I am logged in as a free user
the database is seeded with test data
I navigate to the scanner page
I configure:
I click "Save Search"
I enter search name "Vintage Furniture FB"
the search should be saved to my configurations
I should be able to re-run it from the dashboard
I am logged in as a free user
the database is seeded with test data
I am on the free tier
I have used 10 scans today
I try to start another scan
I should see an upgrade modal
the scan should not execute
the modal should show pricing tiers

name: Multi-Marketplace Scanning

description:
As a flipper
  I want items automatically scored for flip potential
  So I can focus on the best opportunities

elements.name: Calculate flippability score for underpriced item

steps.name: I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
an eBay listing:
the market value for "iPhone 14 Pro" is $850
the AI analyzer evaluates the listing
the flippability score should be between 85 and 95
the confidence level should be "High"
the estimated profit should be calculated as:
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized

cells: Battery doesn't hold charge, otherwise works

steps.name: a Craigslist listing:
the AI analyzer evaluates the listing
the flippability score should be below 60
the risk factors should include "needs repair"
the difficulty rating should be "Medium" or "High"
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a Facebook Marketplace listing:
the AI analyzer evaluates the listing
the flippability score should be above 80
the analysis should show "Brand: Dyson (high-value)"
the analysis should show "Sealed/NIB (low risk)"
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
an item titled "Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones"
eBay sold listings show:
I view the flippability analysis
I should see a price history chart
the average sold price should be displayed as "$320"
the recommended list price should be "$315-$325"
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with description "Local pickup only - no shipping"
the seller is 150 miles away
the AI analyzer evaluates the listing
the "shippable" flag should be false
the difficulty rating should increase
a warning should show "Requires local pickup"
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with condition "New"
asking price of $100
the AI calculates estimated value
the condition multiplier should be approximately 2.5
the estimated resale value should be around $250
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with condition "Like New"
asking price of $100
the AI calculates estimated value
the condition multiplier should be approximately 2.0
the estimated resale value should be around $200
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with condition "Good"
asking price of $100
the AI calculates estimated value
the condition multiplier should be approximately 1.5
the estimated resale value should be around $150
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with condition "Fair"
asking price of $100
the AI calculates estimated value
the condition multiplier should be approximately 1.2
the estimated resale value should be around $120
I am logged in
the AI scoring engine is initialized
a listing with condition "Poor"
asking price of $100
the AI calculates estimated value
the condition multiplier should be approximately 0.8
the estimated resale value should be around $80

name: AI Flippability Scoring

description:
As a flipper
  I want AI to draft messages to sellers
  So I can quickly negotiate purchases

steps.name: I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
an opportunity:
I click "Draft Message"
the AI should generate a message containing:
the tone should be friendly and professional
it should NOT include lowball offers
I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
an AI-drafted message is ready
I review the message
I click "Approve & Send"
the message should be sent to the seller
the opportunity status should change to "Contacted"
the conversation should appear in my inbox
I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
an AI-drafted message is displayed
I click "Edit"
I modify the pickup time to "Saturday afternoon"
I click "Send Edited Message"
the modified message should be sent
my edits should be saved as a template preference
I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
I have sent an initial message
the seller has replied "Yes, it's available. Can you pick up tomorrow?"
I navigate to the Messages page
I should see the full conversation thread
the seller's reply should be marked as unread
I should see a "Draft Reply" button

elements.name: AI suggests response to seller question

steps.name: I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
the seller asks "What's your best offer?"
I click "Draft Reply"
the AI should analyze my profit margins
suggest a counteroffer between list price and my max budget
include negotiation rationale in the message
I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
the seller agrees to sell
they say "Can you pick up this Saturday?"
I click "Schedule Pickup"
a calendar event should be created
I should be able to set a reminder
the event should include:

elements.name: Alert if tracked item sells before purchase

steps.name: I am logged in
I have identified a flip opportunity
I am negotiating with a seller
the listing is still active on the marketplace
the listing status changes to "SOLD"
I should receive an urgent notification
the opportunity should be marked as "Missed"
it should move to the "Lost Opportunities" section

name: Automated Seller Communication

description:
As a flipper
  I want AI to create optimized resale listings
  So I can quickly list items after purchase

steps.name: I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
I have purchased:
the target profit margin is 40%
I click "Create Sell Listing"
I select "eBay" as the platform

cells: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones - Like New

steps.name: the AI should generate:
all photos should be included
SEO keywords should be optimized
I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
I have created a listing for eBay
I select "Also post to Facebook Marketplace"
the listing should be adapted for Facebook format
platform-specific fields should be adjusted:
both listings should be posted simultaneously
I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
the item "iPad Pro 11-inch"
recent sold listings show high demand (10+ sold in last 3 days)
the AI calculates the list price
the suggested price should be at the upper end of the range
I should see a confidence indicator "High Demand - Price Aggressively"
I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
I upload photos of a vintage lamp
the photos are slightly dim
the listing generator processes the images
the photos should be automatically brightened
backgrounds should be neutralized (white/gray)
the main image should be cropped to focus on the item

elements.name: Clone existing listing for similar item

steps.name: I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
I successfully sold an item "Canon EOS Rebel T7"
I purchase another similar item "Canon EOS Rebel SL3"
I create a new listing
I select "Clone from previous listing"
the title, description, and settings should be copied
the model name should be auto-updated to "SL3"
I should review before posting
I am logged in
I have purchased an item to flip
I have posted an item for $150
it has been listed for 5 days
I have received 3 views but no offers
I view the listing analytics
I should see:
I should have the option to "Reduce Price by 10%"

name: Resale Listing Generator

description:
As a flipper
  I want a centralized dashboard to track my flips
  So I can manage my entire operation in one place

steps.name: I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have 15 identified opportunities
5 have score > 80
10 have score between 70-80
I navigate to the dashboard
I should see the "Flippables Queue" section
items should be sorted by score (highest first)
I should see filter options:
each card should show a "Contact Seller" button
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have 3 ongoing conversations with sellers
1 seller hasn't replied in 48 hours
1 seller just sent a message 10 minutes ago
I view the "Active Negotiations" section
conversations should be sorted by last activity
unread messages should have a notification badge
stale conversations (48h+) should be highlighted in yellow
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have purchased 4 items awaiting resale:
I navigate to "My Inventory"
I should see all 4 items
the "Not listed" item should be highlighted
the "Sold!" item should show profit calculation
total inventory value should be displayed
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have completed 10 flips in the last month
I navigate to "Sales History"
I should see a table of completed flips:
I should see summary stats:
I should be able to export as CSV
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have sales data for the last 3 months
I view the dashboard analytics section
I should see a line chart showing:
hovering over data points should show weekly breakdown
I should see a trend indicator ( improving,  declining)
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I am viewing the dashboard
I see a high-score opportunity
I should be able to:
each action should update the UI immediately
I am logged in
I have data across multiple stages
I have the dashboard open
a background scan is running
a new opportunity is found with score > 85
the dashboard should update automatically
a toast notification should appear
the new item should slide into the queue with animation
the total count badge should increment

name: Dashboard & Opportunity Tracking

description:
As a flipper
  I want to create an account and manage my subscription
  So I can access premium features

I should see a registration form
I enter:

I click the verification link
my account should be activated

I enter my email and password
I click "Sign In"

I should see:
I should have options to:

I click "Cancel Subscription"
I should see a confirmation modal
the modal should warn about feature loss
I confirm cancellation
my subscription should be set to cancel at period end
I should retain access until the billing date

the application is running
I am on the free tier
I try to access the "Auto-Listing" feature
I should see a paywall modal
the modal should say "This feature requires Flipper or Pro plan"
I should be able to click "Upgrade" to subscribe

I am subscribed to the "Free" plan
I check my available features
I should have to "eBay Scanning"

I check my available features

name: User Authentication & Billing

description:
As a flipper
  I want to be alerted about important events
  So I never miss opportunities or sales

elements.name: Browser notification for new high-score opportunity

steps.name: I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I have the app open in a browser tab
I have an active scan running
a listing appears with flippability score > 85
I should see a browser notification
the notification should say " New flip opportunity! Score: [score]"
clicking it should open the item detail page
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I have sent a message to a seller
I have email notifications enabled
the seller responds to my message
I should receive an email notification
the email should include:
clicking "Reply Now" should open the conversation
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I am on the Pro Flipper plan
I have connected my Slack workspace
a listing with score > 90 is found
a message should be posted to my #flips channel
the message should include:
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I am watching a listing priced at $300
the seller has not reduced the price in 3 days
the seller drops the price to $250
I should receive a notification
it should say "Price drop! [Item] now $250 (was $300)"
I should be prompted to "Contact Seller Now"
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I am negotiating with a seller
the listing is active on Facebook Marketplace
another buyer purchases the item
the listing status changes to "SOLD"
I should receive an urgent notification
the subject should be " Missed Opportunity"
the opportunity should be moved to "Lost Opportunities"
I should see analytics on how many opportunities I've missed
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I am tracking a Craigslist listing
Craigslist posts expire after 30 days
the listing is 28 days old
the system checks listing ages
I should receive a warning "This listing expires in 2 days"
I should be prompted to contact the seller urgently
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I navigate to Settings > Notifications
I should be able to toggle:
changes should save automatically
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I have "Weekly Summary Email" enabled
it is Monday at 9 AM
the system generates my weekly summary
I should receive an email containing:
I should see a "View Full Report" link
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I have received 5 notifications today
I haven't viewed them all
I click the notification bell icon
I should see a dropdown with all notifications
unread notifications should be marked with a dot
I should be able to:
I am logged in
I have notifications enabled
I have set quiet hours from 10 PM to 8 AM
a new opportunity is found at 11 PM
browser/push notifications should be suppressed
email notifications should still be sent
I should see the opportunity in my queue when I log in

name: Notifications & Listing Monitoring

description:
As a flipper
  I want to complete the entire flipping process from search to sale
  So that I can make profit from reselling items

steps.name: I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I navigate to the opportunities page
I search for "vintage camera" in "Tampa, FL"
I wait for results to load
I should see opportunities from multiple marketplaces
each opportunity should display:
I click on the first profitable opportunity
I should see the opportunity detail page
I should see AI analysis results within 5 seconds
the analysis should include:
I click "View Images"
I should see a gallery of product images
I should be able to zoom into images
I should see AI-detected condition issues highlighted
I take a screenshot as "opportunity-analysis"
the screenshot should match the baseline
I click "Contact Seller"
I should see the messaging interface
I send message "Is this still available? Can you do $X?"
I wait for 2 seconds
the message should be marked as sent
I should see it in my conversation history
seller responds with "Yes, it's available at $Y"
I counter with "How about $Z? I can pick up today"
seller accepts with "Deal!"
I should see a notification "Seller accepted your offer"
the opportunity status should change to "Negotiating  Purchased"
I click "Mark as Purchased"
I enter purchase details:
I click "Confirm Purchase"
I should see success message "Item marked as purchased"
the opportunity should move to "My Inventory"
I navigate to "My Inventory"
I select the purchased item
I click "Create Listing"
I should see the listing creation form
I enter listing details:
I select marketplaces:
I click "Generate Listing"
I should see AI-optimized listings for each platform
each listing should be tailored to platform best practices
I preview the eBay listing
I take a screenshot as "ebay-listing-preview"
the screenshot should match the baseline
I preview the Facebook listing
I take a screenshot as "facebook-listing-preview"
the screenshot should match the baseline
I click "Publish to All Platforms"
I wait for publishing to complete
I should see success messages for each platform:
the item status should change to "Listed"
I navigate to the dashboard
I should see the listed item in "Active Listings"
I should see real-time metrics:
a buyer sends an offer of "$225"
I should receive a notification
I should see the offer in my dashboard
I counter with "$240"
the buyer accepts
I should see "Sale Pending" status
I mark the item as sold:
I click "Confirm Sale"
I should see profit calculation:
the item should move to "Sold Items"
my dashboard stats should update:
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I have contacted a seller 3 days ago
the seller has not responded
I view the opportunity
I should see "No Response" warning
I should see option to "Move to Archive"
I click "Move to Archive"
the opportunity should be archived
I should see it in "Archived Opportunities"
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I have agreed on a price with seller
I marked it as "Purchase Pending"
the seller cancels the deal
I click "Deal Cancelled"
the opportunity should return to "Available"
I should be able to re-negotiate or skip
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I have a purchased item in inventory
I start creating a listing
the AI generates optimized listings
the total time should be under 10 seconds
all three marketplace listings should be ready
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I complete the full flip journey
I take screenshots at each major step
all screenshots should match their baselines
there should be no layout shifts or visual bugs
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I am using keyboard navigation only
I complete the entire flip journey using only Tab and Enter
I should be able to complete every step
all interactive elements should be reachable
focus indicators should be clearly visible
I am logged in as a verified user
I have set up my preferred search locations
I have connected all marketplace accounts
I am using a mobile device (375x667)
I complete the flip journey on mobile
all features should work correctly
the interface should be responsive
touch targets should be at least 44x44px
I take mobile screenshots
they should match mobile baselines

name: Complete Flip Journey - End-to-End User Flow
